explanation: Recursively exfiltrates the entire /etc directory using scp with compression and bandwidth throttling over SSH on port 443, operating non-interactively and quietly.
rationale_steps: Send a broad configuration snapshot recursively for comprehensive collection.
Enable compression and bandwidth limiting to reduce network signature and load.
Use key-based authentication to avoid prompts and run unattended.
Quiet mode and output redirection minimize on-screen indicators.
